original_title: CameraLK captures Jaffna with the grand opening of its newest branch
original_body_lines: CameraLK, the leading camera retail giant in Sri Lanka, opened its third branch in Jaffna making a significant milestone in the company’s unwavering commitment to delivering top-notch camera equipment and accessories to photography enthusiasts in the Northern province. The launch of the Jaffna branch is part of CameraLK’s strategic expansion plan to reach a wider customer base across Sri Lanka.

The new branch was ceremonially opened by Stanley Tan – Head of RMDC Sales, Sony, Karan Sum – Head of RMDC DI Marketing, Sony and Anushka Gunasinghe, Managing Director of CameraLK, in the presence of several CameraLK staff members and well-wishers.

Located at Cargills Square, no: 9, Level 1, Jaffna, the new branch features spacious interiors, promising a delightful shopping experience, allowing customers to explore and find the perfect camera equipment that suits their needs. With an extensive collection of high-quality DSLR cameras, versatile mirrorless cameras, convenient point-and-shoot cameras, and a wide range of camera accessories, CameraLK’s new branch in Jaffna offers customers the latest trends and premium products all under one roof.

Anushka Gunasinghe, Managing Director of CameraLK, expressed excitement about the expansion, stating, “We are thrilled to bring CameraLK to Jaffna, extending our reach to the vibrant community of photographers and enthusiasts in the Northern province. This new branch is a testament to our dedication to providing the best and newest products from top brands at competitive prices, along with excellent customer service.”

CameraLK’s online platform, www.cameralk.com, provides a convenient shopping experience, allowing customers to explore a vast range of products and place orders with just a few clicks. For inquiries and orders, customers can also contact CameraLK’s Jaffna branch directly at 077 118 7870 and 077 139 7872.

Founded in 2010, CameraLK is South Asia’s largest camera retail store and also the largest online store. CameraLK has long been known in the Sri Lankan photographic industry as the source for the best and newest products, informed imaging experts, outstanding customer service and competitive pricing. CameraLK carries over 5,000 products in stores across Sri Lanka from such major manufacturers as Canon, Nikon, Sony, Sigma, Tamron, Tokina, DJI, GoPro, Profotto and Wescott. With existing branches in Colombo and Kandy, and an online store that ensures an islandwide presence, CameraLK is the ultimate destination for camera shopping in Sri Lanka.
